keyMoments.title: Luffy Defeats Enel
keyMoments.description: Captain Luffy defeats the tyrannical god Enel, saving Skypiea and ringing the Golden Bell.
keyMoments.significance: Major victory for the crew, ending the Skypiea conflict and proving their strength against one of the most powerful Logia users.

keyMoments.title: Fulfilling Cricket's Dream
keyMoments.description: The crew's actions result in the Golden Bell ringing, proving to Mont Blanc Cricket that the City of Gold exists.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the far-reaching impact of the Straw Hats' adventures and their tendency to help people achieve their dreams.
